basics.summary: Associate Professor at Xi'an Jiaotong-Liverpool University with expertise in Human-Computer Interaction, Virtual Reality, and Cultural Heritage. Published 90+ papers, obtained 19 research grants as PI, and supervising 5 PhD students. Leading HER Lab research group.

education.summary: Thesis: Interaction, Communication, and Engagement in Hybrid Virtual and Augmented Reality Environments. Nominee of IEEE VGTC Virtual Reality Outstanding Dissertation. Supervisors: Prof. Eugene Ch'ng, Dr. Sue Cobb and Prof. Simon See. Recipient of a full scholarship for a four-year PhD programme and the Postgraduate Award 2020.

Graduated with a first-class honours degree, the Vice-Chancellor's Medal and the Presidential Award. Winner of the Chinese National Scholarship Award, Outstanding Graduate of Zhejiang Province, Nottingham Advantage Award and the Provost's Scholarship (top 1.5%).
